down for just a few seconds
straight off the top the narrator tells

he's stuck in this relationship with a

the relationship is but the song masks

they're staying together out of

a deceptive or interrupted cadence see
each phrase of the song is split into
six measures and has a chord progression
[Music]
the first 4/4 measure is in G major with
the second and third 4/4 measure in C
major Andre then uses a deceptive
cadence with a 2/4 measure of a D major

four four measures of an E major chord
traditionally the five chord D major in
this case wants to resolve back to the
one but it doesn't we are then deceived
it invokes the song with a hanging or
